page.title: 12NORTH WORLE.
page.content: Worle is a rapidly growing, self-contained village approximately two and a half miles from Weston-Super-Mare.Over the past five years the farm land on the outskirts of Worle have been sold and used for huge devolpments. These devolpments are situated within a few minutes drive of the M5 motorway this provides fast and easy access to Bristol,and the South West. There is also a small Industrial Centre which comprises of a varity of Industrial warehousing units,such as tyre and Exhaust Centre,Fitted Kitchens, Furniture Manufacturers and a Double Glazing Company.This centre is ideally situated directly adjoining the North Worle shopping Centre,based on a Sainsbury supermarket and other retail units.Worle is a rapidly expanding surburb of Weston.
